test_cases.milestone: understands kinship terms like grandma, uncle
test_cases.caregiver_response: This is something Avery does very well without any assistance. they first showed this ability when we were at bedtime and has been doing it confidently ever since.

My child is just beginning to gives empty dish to adults. I first noticed attempts about a month ago. It's inconsistent - sometimes they will try when in a good mood but other times they shows no interest.
Avery does this when I provide some assistance. Specifically, they needs help with the finishing but can manage the simpler aspects on their own.

test_cases.milestone: enjoys picture books and recognises smaller details
test_cases.caregiver_response: Avery has completely mastered this skill. they does it on their own not only at home but also when we're at bedtime. It's been consistent for a couple of months.
Yes, Avery demonstrates this ability independently. I've noticed they does this regularly, especially when we are during meals. they seems to enjoy it and will often try to do it again.
